full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Description of the Project

A Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the furnishing of labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for repairs and installations of fences and highway guide rails at Canadian Forces Base Halifax.

The RISO shall commence on June 3rd, 2024 or upon the issuance of the standing offer and will span over 2 years with two optional one-year periods for extension. Bidders may also request a debriefing on the bid results within 15 working days from the notification of unsuccessful bid submissions.

### Important Details

*   Date of Publication: May 2, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: May 21, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   Amendment Date: May 2, 2024
*   Solicitation Number: WS4422450036
*   Region of Delivery: Nova Scotia (Halifax, N.S.)
*   Procurement Category: Specialty Building and Trades Services
*   Trade Agreements Applicable: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and many more (Refer to the full document for the complete list).
